channel.title: CiTR -- Canada Post Rock
channel.description: Canada Post-Rock now resides on the west coast but is still committed to the best in post-rock, drone, ambient, experimental, noise and basically anything your host Pbone can put the word post in front of
channel.itunes:summary: Canada Post-Rock now resides on the west coast but is still committed to the best in post-rock, drone, ambient, experimental, noise and basically anything your host Pbone can put the word post in front of
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: Canada Post-Rock now resides on the west coast but is still committed to the best in post-rock, drone, ambient, experimental, noise and basically anything your host Pbone can put the word post in front of.

item.description: FUNDRIVE SHOW! DONATE

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Nov-2011
item.description: Pre-fundrive Show! Warm up your wallets! Or Purses! Tracks from Nocow, Scroll, Clinton Heibert and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Pre-fundrive Show! Warm up your wallets! Or Purses!

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Nov-2011
item.description: Tracks from Bjork, Hecate, Venetian Snares, Otto Von Schirach and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Lots of techno on this one!

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Nov-2011
item.description: Spooky tracks from Gama Bomb! High Places! Loren Connors! And Mroe! err, I mean more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Halloween Spook-tacular edition!

item.title: Broadcast on 25-Oct-2011
item.description: Tracks from Napalm Death, Discharge, Godflesh and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Tracks from Napalm Death, Discharge, Godflesh and more!

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Oct-2011
item.description: Tracks from Loom, OG Melody, Locrian, Exitmusic, Under The Sun and other terrifying songs!
item.itunes:subtitle: Tracks from Loom, OG Melody, Locrian and other terrifying songs!

item.title: Broadcast on 04-Oct-2011
item.description: Tracks from Prurient, John Maus, Tam and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Tracks from Prurient, John Maus, Tam and more!

item.title: Broadcast on 27-Sep-2011
item.description: Elusive tracks from 13&God, Grasshopper, Umberto & Goblin. Plus some Canadian Post-rock from Tim Hecker, As The Poets Affirm and more.
item.itunes:subtitle: Elusive tracks from 13&God, Grasshopper, Umberto & Goblin.

item.title: Broadcast on 20-Sep-2011
item.description: Tracks from Weedeater, Bison BC, Wolves In The Throne Room and more! and other non-loud bands too! It's good!
item.itunes:subtitle: Tracks from Weedeater, Bison BC, Wolves In The Throne Room and more!

item.title: Broadcast on 13-Sep-2011
item.description: Tracks from Moon Duo, Thurston Moore, Mark McGuire! Not the baseball guy either! Plus Boris!
item.itunes:subtitle: Tracks from Moon Duo, Thurston Moore, Mark McGuire! Not the baseball guy!

item.title: Broadcast on 06-Sep-2011
item.description: Been away but now I'm back. Tracks from Butthole Surfers, Rapeman, Zomby, Ikonika, Grails and Myths!
item.itunes:subtitle: Back from Hiatus! Bring yr daughter to the slaughter!

item.title: Broadcast on 16-Aug-2011
item.description: Tracks from Thomas, Marissa Nadler and Kate Maki! Plus metal from Aggoloch and SunnO)))! All killer no filler!
item.itunes:subtitle: Tracks from Thomas, Marissa Nadler and Kate Maki! Plus metal from Aggoloch and SunnO)))

item.title: Broadcast on 09-Aug-2011
item.description: Some tracks from Beirut, Zach and Owen Pallett! Also Azita, The Caretaker & more. Ends with a long track from Our Love Will Destroy The World
item.itunes:subtitle: Some tracks from Beirut, Zach and Owen Pallett! Also Azita, The Caretaker & more

item.title: Broadcast on 02-Aug-2011
item.description: Holiday Edition! Tracks from Eleanor Friedburger, Woods, Higuma. Plus a barn-burner drone track from Scorces!
item.itunes:subtitle: Holiday Edition! Tracks from Eleanor Friedburger, Woods, Higuma...

item.title: Broadcast on 26-Jul-2011
item.description: Lots of short punk/hardcore songs at the start. Tracks from All Pigs Must Die, Iceage, Barn Owl and more. Also, technology fails pbone once again... Tune in!
item.itunes:subtitle: Punk, hardcore, drone and free jazz

item.title: Broadcast on 19-Jul-2011
item.description: Heavier than normal. Tracks from Ahna, Fucked Up, King Dude, Dead To A Dying World and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Heavier than normal. Tracks from Ahna, Fucked Up, King Dude and more.

item.title: Broadcast on 12-Jul-2011
item.description: Tracks from Crys Cole & Oren Ambarchi plus a show review. Plus epic length Nadja track to finish off with.
item.itunes:subtitle: Tracks from Crys Cole & Oren Ambarchi. Plus epic length Nadja!

item.title: Broadcast on 05-Jul-2011
item.description: Special all girl rock episode with Silv. Plus juicy info Vancouver Girls Rock Camp!
item.itunes:subtitle: Special Girl Rock episode!

item.title: Broadcast on 21-Jun-2011
item.description: Tracks from bands playing Sled Island this week! Fist City, Blonde Redhead, Demon's Claws and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Sled Island special!

item.title: Broadcast on 14-Jun-2011
item.description: From black metal to raw emotional singer songwriters to post-rock and more! Tracks from Shellac, Liturgy, Shannon Wright, Negative Plane and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: From black metal, to post-rock and more on this episode!

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Jun-2011
item.description: Got a "G" theme going on this episode! Tracks from Gore, Godflesh and The Goslings! Ain't nuthin' but a G thang!
item.itunes:subtitle: Bands that start with "G"! and some others that don't!

item.title: Broadcast on 31-May-2011
item.description: On this episode we channel the sounds of Pre-Atlantian worlds and distant planets populated by cyborg lizard deities!
item.itunes:subtitle: Twisted tracks from Hyperreal radio 101.9FM RADIO MARS!

item.title: Broadcast on 24-May-2011
item.description: Tracks from Samara Lubelski, Pink Reason Das Amore and some scary black metal to end off the night!
item.itunes:subtitle: Tracks from Samara Lubelski, Pink Reason and some scary black metal!

item.title: Broadcast on 17-May-2011
item.description: Tracks from Divorce, Outer Space and a set of Lethbridge bands! Also more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Square Waves, Myelin Sheaths, Fist City Lethbridge represent! and more...

item.title: Broadcast on 10-May-2011
item.description: I'm back, sorry for missing last week. Surf was up so I couldn't miss that... New stuff from drone-wizards Locrian, Synth-pop from Ms. Stelmanis, Zola Jesus and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: New episode with vinyl from Locrian, Zola Jesus, Nice Face and more!

item.title: Broadcast on 26-Apr-2011
item.description: Slow moving pop and singer songwriters. Plus a killer Death Unit track to end off this week's episode!
item.itunes:subtitle: Post-Post-Record Store Day Extendo-max Special!

item.title: Broadcast on 19-Apr-2011
item.description: Post record store day special with vinyl from Skull Defekts, Cold Cave, Tonstartsbandht, and more? Tune into find out!
item.itunes:subtitle: Post-Record Store Day Special!

item.title: Broadcast on 12-Apr-2011
item.description: Tracks from Vinyl Dog Toy, Timber Timbre, Quintron on this episode. Plus a few drone-psych-bliss tracks from Pocahaunted and Charalambides.
item.itunes:subtitle: Tracks from Vinyl Dog Toy, Timber Timbre, Quintron on this episode.

item.title: Broadcast on 05-Apr-2011
item.description: Tracks from the late Vic Chesnutt, Frederick Squire, Cowboy Junkies, Papa M and more on tonights program.
item.itunes:subtitle: Mix of sad mopey singer songwriters.

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Mar-2011
item.description: I like turtles.
item.itunes:subtitle: Canada Post-Rock

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Mar-2011
item.description: Mixed bag of treats tonight. Featuring the almighty "Dopesmoker" on wax to close the show!
item.itunes:subtitle: Canada Post-Rock - A mixed bag

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Mar-2011
item.description: It's mah birthday! Plus James Ferraro channeling Radio Mars through CiTR on this episode...
item.itunes:subtitle: Canada Post-Rock - Birthday Special

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Mar-2011
item.description: Some prog and some experimentations with pop songs played at slower speeds.
item.itunes:subtitle: Canada Post-Rock

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Mar-2011
item.description: Lots of vocal music and female artists tonight. Laptop was dead. Winging it!
item.itunes:subtitle: Canada Post-Rock

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Feb-2011
item.description: Plenty of experimental jazz on this episode.
item.itunes:subtitle: Canada Post-Rock

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Feb-2011
item.description: Special Valentine's Day 'Forever Alone' special! Plus a Godspeed song.
item.itunes:subtitle: Canada Post-Rock - Valentine's Day Extravaganza!

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Feb-2011
item.description: Lot's of electronica and ambient. this episode of Canada Post-Rock. Some harsh noise at the end though :)
item.itunes:subtitle: Second show

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Feb-2011
item.description: First show for Canada Post-Rock. A few kinks and technical difficulties but soon will pass. Lots of noise, drone and ambient electronica on this first episode.
item.itunes:subtitle: Canada Post-Rock
